title: Oil review. No. 05
creator_credit: Film Producers Guild and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. The Gulf run: illustrates the delivery of oil by the SS “Khuzistan” to small ports on the Persian Gulf, a four days journey. 2. Turbo prop tour: the visit to Paris of the British jet-propelled civil airliner, the “Vickers Viscount” including shots whilst in flight, refuelling and landing.
